title: Drawing, Design in Plan and Elevation for Mahogany Sideboard on Casters, 1900–05
title_raw: Design in Plan and Elevation for Mahogany Sideboard on Casters
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, center below elevation: SIDEBOARD / of Mahogany; below plan at center: PLAN; lower right corner: B; upper center of plan, numerical notations.
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description:
Elevation view: rectangular sideboard with 4 turned and fluted straight tapering legs on casters; tri-partite front has 3 drawers flanked by 2 doors; low backsplash.
Plan view: slightly protruding front section with rounded front corners.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design in Plan and Elevation for Mahogany Sideboard on Casters, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-43
